project(imgui_node_editor VERSION 0.9.4)

find_package(imgui REQUIRED)

set(_imgui_node_editor_Sources
    crude_json.cpp
    crude_json.h
    imgui_bezier_math.h
    imgui_bezier_math.inl
    imgui_canvas.cpp
    imgui_canvas.cpp
    imgui_canvas.h
    imgui_canvas.h
    imgui_extra_math.h
    imgui_extra_math.inl
    imgui_node_editor_api.cpp
    imgui_node_editor_internal.h
    imgui_node_editor_internal.inl
    imgui_node_editor.cpp
    imgui_node_editor.h
    misc/imgui_node_editor.natvis
)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${_imgui_node_editor_Sources})

target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(imgui_node_editor PUBLIC imgui)

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${_imgui_node_editor_Sources})

set_property(TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY FOLDER "external")
